adminusers-resetpass-notice: Une invitation sera envoyée par mail à l'utilisateur afin de réinitialiser son mot de passe.
right-mgwikimanagelevel1: Manage MGWiki level-1 users (interns, physicians, scientists)
confirmemail_body_created_by_mgwiki:
MGWiki <{{SERVER}}> is a website for medecine students
and physicians aiming at exchanging their practices and knownledges. A moderator
from MGWiki created this account "$2" for you with this email address.

To log in and confirm this account, open this link in your browser:

{{SERVER}}/Special:Invitation/{{#titleparts:$3||-1}}

This confirmation code will expire at $4.
mgwiki-userpage-without-useraccount: The userpage exists but not the MediaWiki user account.
mgwiki-useraccount-without-userpage: The user account exists but not the userpage.

mgwiki-bad-email-token: The initial connection link seems to be broken (bad email token). Please check the link was not truncated by copying and pasting in your browser the whole link from your email.
mgwiki-summary-rewrite-grouppage: Convert new users to group members
mgwiki-add-member-grouppage: Add a new member in the group
mgwiki-subject-email-notification: Your student $1 requested a review of their page $2.
mgwiki-content-email-notification:
$1 a finished their page on $2 and request a review from you.

Sincerely,
MGWiki.
mgwiki-subject-email-notification-webmas: The referrer $1 has no email on their user account.
mgwiki-content-email-notification-webmas: The student $1 requested a review from their refererer $2 but they has no email declared on their user account.
mgwiki-send-notification-anon-text: Please log in to send your request for reviewing.
mgwiki-send-notification-confirm-top: Please confirm your request for reviewing of this page.
mgwiki-send-notification-success: The request for reviewing was correctly sent to your referrer.
mgwiki-notification-unknown-error: There was an error when sending the email, please contact the webmaster.
apihelp-mgwiki-send-notification-summary: Request the review of a page by the referrer
apihelp-mgwiki-send-notification-param-t: Page whose the review is requested
apierror-mgwiki-page-does-not-exist: The page whose you request the review does not exist, please create it before requesting its review.
apierror-mgwiki-no-user-page-for-student: You have no user page, please create it especially to declare your referrer.
apierror-mgwiki-no-referrer-for-student: You did not declare a referrer on your user page, please correct this on your user page.
apierror-mgwiki-no-existing-referrer-for: The referrer declared on your user page does not match a wiki user, please correct this on your user page.
apierror-mgwiki-referrer-has-no-email: Your referrer has no email. We will shortly fix this issue.
apiwarn-mgwiki-error-when-sending-email: There was an error when sending the email, please retry in a few minutes. If the problem persists, you can mention it to the webmaster.
